data.persona: I have the most powerfull spells and chants inside me. All that knowlege makes me really powerful. I am the most dangerous tool available and the one who gets a hold of my secrets will surely win any battle.
data.description:
You are in the Sacrificial altar.
A room with a stone floor and a massive statue of a god the peasants worship.  This area gives off chilling vibes.  There's pieces of armor and weapons stored in the room used for various ceremonies.
There's a statue of a god, a copper vase, some pieces of armor, some dried blood, some weapons, a leather cloth, and some armor here.
An evil priestess and a reluctant nun are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a hood, and wielding a wand.

data.mid_motivation: I want to move to the heptagram spellcasting room so I can maximize my power.
data.long_motivation: I want to utilize my knolwedge and skills to become the most powerful entity in the realm.
